[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OS-Unix-blue.svg?longCache=True)]()

#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install refork
```

#### Scripts usage
```bash
usage: refork [url]
```

#### Examples
```bash
$ cd path/to/forked-repo
$ refork git@github.com:wbond/package_control_channel.git # url required 1 time only
```
